for i in range(t):

n=int(input())
mylist=[]
while n>0:
    num=input()
    first=num[0]
    last=num[-1]
    first=int(first)
    last=int(last)
    sum=first+last
    mylist.append(sum)
    sum=0
    n=n-1
for i in mylist:
    print(i)
